message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its features and potential return on investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
I understand your perspective, Bob. However,  $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $12,000, which is my absolute bottom line.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $11,500? It's the best I can do at this point.
